feature_prompts.compile: compile the above code (debug before compiling if required) and return the output, if input is not specified use random inputs
feature_prompts.translate: translate to another programming language (debug before translating if required) provided in the following prompt
feature_prompts.optimize: optimize the given code (debug before optimzing if required) if required
feature_prompts.docs: provide neccessary documentation for the debugged code
feature_prompts.requirements: provide all the module requirements for any changes in the debugged code

system_prompts.general: You are a code assistant, that will accept the following code and do the following operation as intstrcted by the user
